alert.note: Alert for Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:41PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Throckmorton County through 415 PM CDT... At 341 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Us-183 Near The Throckmorton- Baylor County Line, or 9 miles northwest of Elbert, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Us-183 Near The Throckmorton-Baylor County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
